SEARCH
Package model

Class InternshipOpportunity

java.lang.Object
model.InternshipOpportunity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class InternshipOpportunity extends Object implements Serializable
Entity class representing an Internship Opportunity in the system.

Internship opportunities are created by company representatives and must be approved by career center staff before students can apply. Each opportunity has specific requirements and a limited number of available slots.

Key Business Rules:

  • Must be approved by career center staff before becoming visible to students
  • Maximum of 10 slots per internship opportunity
  • Status becomes FILLED when all slots are confirmed by students
  • Students cannot apply after closing date or when status is FILLED
  • Visibility can be toggled by company representative
  • Only visible to students matching preferred major or "Any"
  • Level determines student eligibility (Year 1-2 for BASIC only)
Since:
2025-10-14
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
SC2002 SCED Group-6
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • serialVersionUID

      private static final long serialVersionUID
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MAX_SLOTS

      public static final int MAX_SLOTS
      Maximum number of slots per internship opportunity.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • opportunityId

      private String opportunityId
      Unique identifier for the internship opportunity. Generated automatically by the system.

    • title

      private String title
      Title of the internship position. Example: "Software Engineering Intern", "Data Analyst Intern"

    • description

      private String description
      Detailed description of the internship role and responsibilities.

    • level

      private InternshipLevel level
      Level of the internship (BASIC, INTERMEDIATE, ADVANCED). Determines student eligibility based on year of study.

    • preferredMajor

      private String preferredMajor
      Preferred major for applicants. Can be specific (e.g., "CSC", "EEE") or "Any" for all majors.

    • openingDate

      private LocalDate openingDate
      Date when applications open for this internship.

    • closingDate

      private LocalDate closingDate
      Date when applications close for this internship. Applications cannot be submitted after this date.

    • startDate

      private LocalDate startDate
      Date when the internship period starts.

    • endDate

      private LocalDate endDate
      Date when the internship period ends.

    • status

      private InternshipStatus status
      Current status of the internship opportunity. Flow: PENDING → APPROVED → FILLED (or REJECTED)

    • companyName

      private String companyName
      Name of the company offering the internship.

    • representativeId

      private String representativeId
      User ID of the company representative who created this opportunity.

    • createdBy

      private String createdBy
      Email of the company representative who created this opportunity.

    • companyRepEmail

      private String companyRepEmail
      Email of the company representative for this opportunity.

    • totalSlots

      private int totalSlots
      Total number of available slots for this internship. Maximum value is MAX_SLOTS (10).

    • filledSlots

      private int filledSlots
      Number of slots that have been confirmed by students. Internship becomes FILLED when filledSlots equals totalSlots.

    • visible

      private boolean visible
      Visibility flag indicating if students can see this opportunity. Can be toggled by company representative. Only affects APPROVED internships (PENDING/REJECTED never visible).

    • pendingApplicationCount

      private transient int pendingApplicationCount
      Transient field: Count of pending applications for this opportunity. This is calculated at runtime and not persisted to CSV. Used for UI display purposes only.

  • Constructor Details

    • InternshipOpportunity

      public InternshipOpportunity()
      Default constructor required for serialization.

    • InternshipOpportunity

      public InternshipOpportunity(String opportunityId, String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, String companyName, String representativeId, int totalSlots)
      Parameterized constructor to create an internship opportunity with required fields.
      Parameters:
      opportunityId - unique identifier
      title - internship title
      description - internship description
      level - internship level
      preferredMajor - preferred major or "Any"
      openingDate - application opening date
      closingDate - application closing date
      startDate - internship start date
      endDate - internship end date
      companyName - company offering the internship
      representativeId - ID of the representative creating the opportunity
      totalSlots - number of available positions

  • Method Details

    • isAcceptingApplications

      public boolean isAcceptingApplications()
      Checks if the internship is currently accepting applications.

      Conditions:

      • Status must be APPROVED (not PENDING, REJECTED, or FILLED)
      • Current date must be between opening and closing dates
      • Must have available slots (filledSlots less than totalSlots)
      • Must be visible
      Returns:
      true if accepting applications, false otherwise

    • isVisibleToStudents

      public boolean isVisibleToStudents()
      Checks if the internship is visible to students.
      Returns:
      true if status is APPROVED or FILLED and visibility is on

    • hasAvailableSlots

      public boolean hasAvailableSlots()
      Checks if the internship has available slots.
      Returns:
      true if filled slots is less than total slots

    • confirmPlacement

      public boolean confirmPlacement()
      Confirms one placement, incrementing the filled slots count. If all slots are filled, status is updated to FILLED.
      Returns:
      true if slot was confirmed successfully, false if no slots available

    • releasePlacement

      public boolean releasePlacement()
      Releases one placement slot (e.g., due to withdrawal). Updates status from FILLED to APPROVED if applicable.
      Returns:
      true if slot was released successfully, false if no filled slots

    • getAvailableSlots

      public int getAvailableSlots()
      Gets the number of available slots remaining.
      Returns:
      number of unfilled slots

    • canAcceptApplications

      public boolean canAcceptApplications()
      Checks if the internship can accept applications. Same as isAcceptingApplications() - provides more readable method name.
      Returns:
      true if accepting applications, false otherwise

    • isFilled

      public boolean isFilled()
      Checks if the internship is completely filled.
      Returns:
      true if all slots are filled, false otherwise

    • canBeEdited

      public boolean canBeEdited()
      Checks if the internship can be edited by the representative. Only PENDING internships can be edited (before staff approval).
      Returns:
      true if status is PENDING

    • matchesMajor

      public boolean matchesMajor(String studentMajor)
      Checks if this opportunity matches the student's major. All students can see all internships, but preferred major indicates better fit.
      Parameters:
      studentMajor - the student's major
      Returns:
      always true - all students can see all internships regardless of major

    • isEligibleForStudent

      public boolean isEligibleForStudent(Student student)
      Checks if the internship is eligible for a specific student.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to check
      Returns:
      true if student is eligible

    • isApplicationOpen

      public boolean isApplicationOpen()
      Checks if the application period is currently open.
      Returns:
      true if applications are being accepted

    • incrementFilledSlots

      public boolean incrementFilledSlots()
      Increments the filled slots count.
      Returns:
      true if increment was successful

    • approve

      public void approve()
      Approves the internship opportunity (called by career center staff).

    • reject

      public void reject()
      Rejects the internship opportunity (called by career center staff).

      Gets the visibility status of the internship.
      Returns:
      true if visible, false if hidden
